The expert: s analysis of the interview: The expert examined the interview with Denzel Washington conducted by Yahoo Entertainment on January 27. They analyzed the questions asked and Washington's responses to determine if he made the statement, "I support police over BLM, don't put them down!"
Verification through other sources: The expert checked if the quote attributed to Denzel Washington was reported by other reputable news sources or if there were any official statements from Washington himself regarding the claim. They found that a representative for Washington told Reuters that the quote is false.
Facebook: s fact-checking efforts: The post containing the claim was flagged by Facebook as part of their efforts to combat false news and misinformation. This indicates that the claim was deemed questionable and required further verification.
Comparison with previous interviews: The expert also examined another interview with Denzel Washington from December 2016, where he was asked about the Black Lives Matter movement. They found that while Washington did not mention Black Lives Matter in the January 2021 interview, he was asked about it in a previous interview, suggesting that the claim may not be accurate.
